enb_long_title: Eighth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: On Friday, 25 October, the Secretariat presented a scoping paper on cross- cutting thematic areas under the UNFCCC, the United Nations Convention to Combat Desertification (UNCCD) and Convention on Biodiversity (CBD).
Parties diverged on the terms of reference for a workshop.

An informal contact group, co-chaired by Jimena Nieto (Colombia) and Outi Berghäll (Finland), was convened. On Tuesday, 29 October, Co-Chair Nieto reported on consultations and SBSTA adopted draft conclusions.
